channel.title: Dave Scott's Blog
channel.description: Dave Scott works on Docker, bringing the benefits of containers to developers everywhere.

item.title: Hello World with Gaussian Splats
item.description: An interactive 3D Gaussian splat viewer showing a scene reconstructed from a photo using Apple's ml-sharp library.

item.title: Thoughts on Unikernels
item.description: Thoughts on Unikernels, after our 2013 paper ("Unikernels: Library Operating Systems for the Cloud") won one of the Influential Paper Awards at the 2025 ASPLOS conference.

item.title: Docker containers, space usage and OCaml qcow2 disk defragmentation
item.description: A deep dive into where data is stored in Docker containers, and how we could reclaim space using an OCaml qcow2 disk defragmentor

item.title: Understanding CLOS Network Switches
item.description: A deep dive into the architecture of network switches, featuring an interactive 3D visualization of CLOS networks, inspired by Sandy Fraser's approach to designing large-scale switches.

item.title: Summary of performance improvements in Docker Desktop 4.22
item.description: Improved networking performance, faster builds, lower memory usage and a "Resource Saver" mode.

item.title: Summary of improvements in Docker Desktop 4.21
item.description: Support for Wasm, better support for Rust, startup is much faster and there's a new UI to show builds.

item.title: Dockershim not needed: Docker Desktop with Kubernetes 1.24+
item.description: Lots of people have been asking us about the removal of a component called "dockershim" from upstream Kubernetes and how this will affect Docker Desktop. It won't affect anyone at all.

item.title: How Docker Desktop Networking works under the hood
item.description: All about the Unikernel-inspired userspace networking stack that connects containers to the outside world in Docker Desktop.

item.title: Early Docker build demonstrates incoming Apple Silicon support
item.description: An appleinsider post by Malcolm Owen based on my screenshot of an early Docker Desktop build running on Apple Silicon.

item.title: Capturing logs in Docker Desktop
item.description: A deep-dive into how the logging system works, joint work with Magnus Skjegstad

item.title: New Filesharing Implementation in Docker Desktop Windows
item.description: We replaced a complex SMB/CIFS based implementation with a FUSE+VSOCK-based one, to increase reliability and performance.

item.title: Addressing Time Drift in Docker for Mac
item.description: Discusses time sync between the LinuxKit VM and the host.

item.title: Docker for Mac: reducing disk space
item.description: Tips for reducing disk space usage in Docker for Mac by understanding and using TRIM.

item.title: macOS Sierra 10.12 release notes
item.description: Apple's release notes for macOS Sierra 10.12, which includes a fix for CVE-2016-4739 affecting mDNSResponder, joint work with Magnus Skjegstad and Anil Madhavapeddy.

item.title: Why we use OPAM for XenServer development
item.description: Describing how XenServer development benefits from the new OCaml package manager, OPAM.

item.title: Architecture of the "xapi toolstack" for Xen
item.description: A high-level overview of the "xapi toolstack" which supports clusters, shared storage with live migration, HA etc.

item.title: Using Irmin to add fault-tolerance to the Xenstore database
item.description: Xenstore is a critical component needed by hosts running the Xen hypervisor. We can use Irmin to add extra fault-tolerance.

item.title: Ceph and libvirt technology preview
item.description: Experimental packages which added support for libvirt and Ceph to XenServer.

item.title: Building a "Xenstore stub domain" with MirageOS
item.description: Using MirageOS to harden a critical service called "xenstore", required by the Xen hypervisor.
